module.name: skrill
module.description: Skrill, który cieszy się zaufaniem milionów osób na całym świecie, wychodzi naprzeciw potrzebom ponad 156 000 firm, oferując wygodny i bezpieczny sposób wysyłania oraz otrz
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Skrill, który cieszy się zaufaniem milionów osób na całym świecie, wychodzi naprzeciw potrzebom ponad 156 000 firm, oferując wygodny i bezpieczny sposób wysyłania oraz otrzymywania pieniędzy w niemal 200 krajach i 40 walutach.
module.additional_description: Na naszej platformie płatniczej znajdziesz ekskluzywną ofertę obniżonych opłat 0,9% za transakcje za pomocą kart debetowych/kredytowych (VISA, Mastercard, Maestro), a także opłat 0,5% za transakcje Rapid Transfer.*    *Opłaty obowiązują tylko w odniesieniu do nowych partnerów handlowych w ograniczonych sektorach branżowych. Obowiązują zasady i warunki - https://www.skrill.com/pl/stopka/warunki-i-zasady/fees-reduction-promotion/Bezpłatna i szybka konfiguracjaUzyskaj dostęp do kart kredytowych i ponad 100 lokalnych rozwiązań płatniczych dzięki łatwej integracjiŁączność z ponad 50 milionami posiadaczy rachunku SkrillNajwyższe standardy bezpieczeństwa i technologia zapobiegająca nadużyciom finansowymPłynny sposób realizacji płatności za pomocą telefonu komórkowego, tabletu i komputera

module.name: paypal
module.description: PayPal jest liderem w branży płatności online i oferuje szeroką gamę szybkich, prostych i bezpiecznych rozwiązań płatniczych, które cieszą się zaufaniem ponad 300 milionów użytkownik&oac
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayPal jest liderem w branży płatności online i oferuje szeroką gamę szybkich, prostych i bezpiecznych rozwiązań płatniczych, które cieszą się zaufaniem ponad 300 milionów użytkowników. Ten bezpłatny oficjalny moduł umożliwia korzystanie z naszej zaawansowanej platformy handlowej i rozwijanie działalności handlowej w Internecie, w tym także za granicą oraz na urządzeniach mobilnych.
module.additional_description: Łatwa aktywacja: z PayPal możesz niemal natychmiast zacząć odbierać płatności bez żadnych opłat za uruchomienie usługi! Nasze zoptymalizowane rozwiązania mobilne pozwolą Ci zwiększyć współczynnik konwersji nawet do 88,7%* i nie wymagają dodatkowej integracji. A dzięki funkcji One Touch™ kupujący mogą płacić za zakupy jeszcze szybciej niż dotychczas! Program ochrony sprzedających: chroń swoje dochody przed internetowymi oszustwami, korzystając z ochrony sprzedających w systemie PayPal. Ochroną mogą być objęte zarówno artykuły materialne, jak i dobra niematerialne, a także większość usług.  Przejrzyste zasady dotyczące opłat gwarantują, że nie spotkają Cię niemiłe niespodzianki. Żadnych ukrytych opłat. Prowizja jest naliczana tylko podczas odbierania płatności. Im więcej płatności otrzymujesz, tym mniej za to płacisz.  * Współczynnik konwersji obliczony w IV kwartale 2017 r. w ramach internetowego badania Comscore. Analizie poddano zachowania zakupowe w dwudziestu witrynach dużych handlowców z różnych kategorii przy wykorzystaniu panelu obejmującego milion konsumentów w USA.

module.name: boxtalconnect
module.displayName: Boxtal Connect - 1st shipping solution in Europe
module.description: Managing your shipments becomes easier with our free plugin Boxtal! Save time thanks to our shipping center and enjoy our negotiated rates with the best carriers: Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Relais Coli
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Managing your shipments becomes easier with our free plugin Boxtal! Save time thanks to our shipping center and enjoy our negotiated rates with the best carriers: Colissimo, Mondial Relay, Relais Colis, Delivengo,UPS, DHL, etc.
module.additional_description: 1. Multiply your conversion rate by 2 and boost your net salesWith our negotiated rates for the best carriers, with no contract and no minimum volume requirement, you offer the best delivery rates to your customers.Maximize your chances to convert by offering the 3 types of shipping expected by your customers: the economic collection point (Mondial Relay, Relais Colis ...), home delivery in 48H (Colissimo) or the express for the most hurried ones (Chronopost, UPS, Fedex, TNT, DHL ...).The Boxtal Connect plugin can display the pick-up location map for carriers of your choice.And it's as simple as a checkbox in your backoffice! 2.  Save 1 hour each day in the management of your shippingsOur free Boxtal Connect plugin allows you to import your orders on boxtal.com in 1 click and manage your shipments in record time. No need to re-enter information, your customer’s choice of delivery is retrieved and the corresponding offers are listed. All you have to do is print all your transport labels and prepare your parcels.Boxtal helps you in the customs formalities for your international shipments: when filling an order, we display the right form and the necessary documents are generated at the same time as the labels. 3. Improve your customers' experience to build loyaltyWith Boxtal's efficient parcel tracking, you know where your parcels are located and you are informed of delays or delivery incidents! Your customers can view tracking statuses and receive shipping notifications if you turn on this option.Finally, you can generate return labels in just a few clicks in case your customers want to do so. 4. Security and reliability for you and your customersThe privacy and security of your data are important to you ? No worries: all the exchanges between your WooCommerce shop and Boxtal are encrypted! Nobody will be able to intercept your information or those of your customers.Ensuring the availability of our solution 24 hours a day is our priority: we constantly monitor our technical infrastructure to ensure that your business will not be disrupted.

module.name: netreviews
module.description: Your customers' reviews have become key to boosting your sales! Collect them now with Verified Reviews and get your AdWords stars thanks to our partnership with Google
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your customers' reviews have become key to boosting your sales! Collect them now with Verified Reviews and get your AdWords stars thanks to our partnership with Google.
module.additional_description: Specialized in the multichannel collection (online/offline) of customer reviews, Verified Reviews measures, and analyses your customer's satisfaction so you can improve and drive your business decisions. We offer you a multi-tools platform for the management, follow-up, and an optimal diffusion of all contents collected and enable you to increase your reputation, visibility, and search engine ranking on the internet. Why should you choose Verified Reviews?1 - Fast and simpleLearn how to use the solution very quickly and start now collecting reviews from your clients. We can survey people up to 1 year after their orders. Our pre-built Verified Reviews integration with Oracle Commerce Cloud gets your site up and running with ratings and reviews and customer feedback very quickly, saving development time.2 - Website, product & offline reviewsWe collect 3 different types of reviews via one post-transaction email: website reviews where customers can evaluate your online shop; product reviews which mark specifically the purchases, and offline reviews if you want to show a grade for your offline shops. Everything in our solution can be tailored for your needs from emails, forms, campaign deadlines, and widget displays.3 - A global partnership with GoogleWant some stars in your SEM? Use our solution and display stars in your AdWords campaigns and PLA. Customers reviews will also allow optimization of your SEO as they produce active content on your product page.4 - A trusted certificateYour reviews are hosted in a Verified Reviews certificate with your name and logo on it. It gives more credit to them.

module.name: emarketing
module.description: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Boost your sales on Google Shopping with PrestaShop's marketing solution! The PrestaShop Ads module is your one-click-solution for advertising on Google Shopping. Easy campaign creation, price-comparison and competitor-check included. Free of charge.
module.additional_description: Use the PrestaShop Ads software to create Google Shopping campaigns in no time and without any AdWords knowledge. Our system optimizes your campaigns continuously and fully automated for maximum performance. The PrestaShop Ads module generates the product data feed required for Google Shopping as well as it installs the Conversion Tracking automatically.                                                            You haven’t advertised on Google yet? No problem at all, the PrestaShop Ads module can create an AdWords account and Merchant Center on your behalf. Powerful tools assist you in focusing your ad budget on your most promising products: Use our automated price comparison to find out if competitors offer your products at a cheaper price. PrestaShop Ads  - powered by emarketing is a Google Premium Partner and Google’s Overall Champion EU 2015

module.name: bpostshm
module.description: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop.
module.additional_description: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop.Not only are the different delivery methods (to home or office location, to a parcel locker or a postal point) immediately available in your shop, you can also manage most of the settings directly via the Prestashop backend, print the labels and access the Track & Trace. The add-on is free of charge, still a contract with bpost should be signed in order to have access to the bpost logistical solutions. What this module does for you-      Easy set-up, plug & play-      Responsive design-      All bpost delivery methods are immediately available:@home (national & international)@pickup point (national & international)@Parcels locker International-      Configure prices per delivery method, independently and directly in the module-      Use most common options for your sendings (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation)-      Print directly from the backend-      Track & Trace your parcels from the backend

module.name: dpdfrance

module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The DPD France module allows you to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home and office delivery, etc. and take advantage of an automated system for managing your orders.
module.additional_description: Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.

module.name: chronopost
module.description: Chronopost supports more than 5800 e-merchants in the development of their business
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Chronopost supports more than 5800 e-merchants in the development of their business. Access the most innovative transport solutions on the market and offer the best express delivery experience to your customers, in France or around the world.
module.additional_description: Thanks to the Chronopost extension, offer your customers the most innovative delivery methods on the market and develop your business in France and abroad easily! No additional development is required, all Chronopost's Express delivery offers and services are included in this module.You will be able to easily present to your customers the different contractualized services.The simple and quick installation and configuration of the module will allow you to start your business quickly.Technical support by Chronopost is available if necessary.

module.name: klarnaofficial
module.description: Klarna Checkout is a complete online checkout solution designed to increase sales and customer loyalty. Available in Austria, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klarna Checkout is a complete online checkout solution designed to increase sales and customer loyalty. Available in Austria, Denmark, Finland, Germany, Netherlands, Norway, Sweden, United Kingdom.
module.additional_description: Klarna will improve your checkout experience by providing ways by direct by banking, by invoice or financing. We call these magical payment methods Pay now, Pay later and Slice it. Simple, safe, and oh so smoooth. No matter what Klarna option your customer chooses to pay, you get paid when the goods ship. Klarna deliversOne-click repeat purchases.Global support, local optimization.Klarna absorbs all credit and fraud risk.It’s easy to get started with Klarna. Your benefitYou will see an increase in conversions and order value.You will reach a new audience.You will always get paid.Less operations more selling. Klarna maximizes conversion rates by letting consumers pay in a simple way when and how they prefer to. More people who enter the checkout will actually complete their purchase. To get the credentials you need to get started with Klarna Checkout, sign up here: https://eu.portal.klarna.com/signup/?products=kco&platform=prestashop

module.name: becommerce
module.description: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: BeCommerce is the Belgian Non-Profit that contributes to the strengthening of consumer confidence in e-commerce by a formal labeling process of e-commerce sites. Thanks to its trustmark, BeCommerce contributes to the growth of the sector.
module.additional_description: 1. Confidence and the BeCommerce TrustmarkConsumer trust is crucial and our Trustmark contributes to the increasement of the trust level in e-commerce. In order to use our Trustmark, the webshop has to go through a certification process performed by an independent audit office, Bureau Veritas. Bureau Veritas checks your webshop on about 40 points. Once the certification has been successfully completed, it can carry both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks. We have also negotiated an advantageous price for our members for a rating and review system for your consumers. In addition, BeCommerce also provides twice a year a free penetration test of the webshop urls, so you remain protected against hacking and phishing. Both the BeCommerce and the Ecommerce Europe Trustmarks generate extra trust and can yield more conversions and therefore extra revenues. 2. Research and DataWe provide our members regularly with relevant facts and figures. The BeCommerce Market Monitor gives some insights in consumer spendings on e-commerce in Belgium.  This study of about 70 pages clearly shows the trends and evolutions in Belgian e-commerce, and this on a quarterly basis. You can see who is buying online, how are they buying online, the different analyses by sector, the different payment methods, etc. In addition to the BeCommerce Market Monitor, BeCommerce also publishes the BeCommerce Shopping100, which is a top 100 of the webshops where Belgian consumers most often shop online, including a top 25 cross-border webshops. 3. Networking EventsEvery year we organize several recurring events on topics such as Logistics, Mobile and Cross-Border.  Various companies share their business cases, CEO’s debate some hot topics, and the attendees can discuss this during the network moments in between. The BeCommerce Awards are our yearly competition where various outstanding webshops can obtain prestigious prizes: it gathers the most important e-commerce players in the Belgian market. 4. Dispute ResolutionWe provide an independent ADR-mechanism for e-commerce consumers in Belgium, whereby we refer complaints to the webshop in question or to the ombudsman competent in the issue concerned. 5. Regulatory and Governmental AffairsWe offer our members legal support and keep them up-to-date on new developments in e-commerce.  Together with Ecommerce Europe, we defend the interests of e-commerce at both the European, national and regional levels. Ecommerce Europe is constantly monitoring the European Commission and can always influence new proposals that could affect e-commerce.

module.name: satispay

module.author: Community developer
module.description_full: Satispay is mobile payment platform, independent from debit and credit card networks, usable by anybody with a bank account, acceptable by any merchants using any kind of devices and POS.
module.additional_description: Direct connection to the consumer’s and the merchant’s bank account brings a structural cost advantage to processing payments that Satispay leverages to sign up merchants with a cost-effective, convenient and easy-to-use solution. Thanks to the efficiency of our independent network, Satispay can offer the service to merchants with a pricing model that is both cheap and easy to understand. There are no sign-up costs or monthly fees, the sole charge for merchants is 0.5% on payments less than or equal to 10€ and 0.5% + 0.20€ for payments greater than 10€. Satispay contributes to management costs reduction by improving users’ conversion rate also thanks to the new QR code payments experience.

module.author: Patworx Multimedia

module.additional_description: No risk – Santander takes on the default risk for Purchases on Account and Instalment Purchases at 100%. You receive your money – guaranteed. Real time saving – Santander is responsible for the collection process and thereby reduces your administrative effort. Individual settlement – you receive monthly transaction overviews, adapted to your individual needs Conversion increase – you benefit from the popularity of the product Purchase on Account, the preferred payment method for many customers. Improved liquidity for you – With Purchase on Account and Instalment Purchase you receive your payments each working day without having to wait for the value date. With Direct Transfer the customer instantly transfers the purchase amount to your account. Improved liquidity for your customers – you allow more customers to finance expensive goods with the help of variable instalments and flexile durations. Increased customer loyalty – your customers appreciate the uncomplicated handling and the respectful communication at eye level. Flexible payment – Purchase on Account allows your customer to pay payment terms of up to 30 days. Instalment Purchase offers variable instalments and flexible durations ranging from 3 to 26 months. Direct Transfer allows customers to pay the purchase amount via bank transfer without leaving the shop check-out.

module.name: klarnapaymentsofficial
module.description: Klarna Payments​ are standalone payment methods that complement your checkout with a Klarna hosted widget located in your existing checkout. The latest version 2.0.8 and v1.0
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klarna Payments​ are standalone payment methods that complement your checkout with a Klarna hosted widget located in your existing checkout. The latest version 2.0.8 and v1.0.7 and any future versions, also include Klarna’s On-Site Messaging Feature.
module.additional_description: Klarna Payments enhances your current checkout, offering flexible payment options that empower your customers, giving them choice to pay directly, by invoice or using financing. The Klarna products are Pay now, Pay later and Financing, and all increase conversions and take the friction out of shopping. And that’s not all. No matter which Klarna option shoppers choose, you get paid when that goods ship. The On-Site Messaging feature continues the smooth journey, increasing risk-free sales through tailored messaging and showing your customers available financing options while they’re still shopping. Advertising the ability to pay later, before checkout improves sales.  On-Site Messaging provides customized messaging ranging from banners promoting your partnership with Klarna and availability of payment options, to personalized promotions on product or cart pages. Customers are identified from their first interaction, so the shopping experience can be tailored to suit their needs. Klarna delivers:- Global Compliance- Absorbs all credit and fraud risk- Local support across Europe Your benefits:- Increase in conversions and order value- Reach a new audience- Always get paid To get the credentials you need to get started with Klarna Payments, sign up here.

module.author: Community developer

module.additional_description: By spreading the cost of purchases over time, Payright turns expensive into affordable. By offering zero interest payment plans you make purchases more affordable, without compromising the asking price. Drive additional sales, increase repeat business and reduce cart abandonment. Payright is a quick and simple way to provide better service, by giving people more control and options for how and when they pay. Right where you need it

module.name: bolden
module.description: As a specialist in growth challenges and cash flow needs of SMEs that are poorly addressed by traditional banks, Bolden, a major alternative financing platform and Prestashop's preferred partner,
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: As a specialist in growth challenges and cash flow needs of SMEs that are poorly addressed by traditional banks, Bolden, a major alternative financing platform and Prestashop's preferred partner, offers a financing solution dedicated to e-merchants.
module.additional_description: Stock financing, investment in your e-shop, recruitment...? Finance your growth projects quickly with BoldenAdvance: no paperwork or time wasted thanks to a 100% digital solution and a dedicated contact person. BoldenAdvance is a short-term, repayable and fixed-rate loan that meets all your cash flow needs with more flexibility than a traditional overdraft. You can borrow from €3,000 to €50,000 over a maximum period of 12 months. You can perform one or more repayment schedule simulations, and it is free of charge and without obligation! This financing is available to all commercial companies and individual companies that are Prestashop customers with at least 6 months' activity and a turnover of more than €60,000.

module.name: criteoads
module.description: Zbuduj swoją markę. Przyciągnij więcej odwiedzających. Platforma reklamowa Criteo działa dla firm wszystkich rozmiarów
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Zbuduj swoją markę. Przyciągnij więcej odwiedzających. Platforma reklamowa Criteo działa dla firm wszystkich rozmiarów.      Docieraj do nowych odbiorców i angażuj swoich obecnych klientów za pomocą spersonalizowanej reklamy internetowej. Criteo pomaga przyciągnąć nowych odwiedzających i byłych klientów do Twojego sklepu internetowego PrestaShop, pokazując im produkty, które pokochają.       Criteo chce pomóc rozwijać się wszystkim sklepom nternetowym. Dlatego właśnie opracowaliśmy Criteo Product Ads, moduł stworzony specjalnie dla handlowców Prestashop, abyś mógł korzystać z możliwości inteligentnej technologii Criteo, nawet jeśli dopiero rozpoczynasz swoją działalność.       Nie możemy się doczekać, by pomóc Ci zwiększyć ruch na Twojej stronie!      Wskazówki firmy Criteo dotyczące przygotowania sezonu świątecznego 2020 Criteo jest tu po to, aby pomóc Ci zbudować najbardziej odpowiednią strategię marketingową. Criteo przeprowadziło globalne badanie obejmujące ponad 1000 polskich konsumentów i zidentyfikowało pięć kluczowych trendów, które mogą pomóc w zbudowaniu unikalnego planu na to, co z pewnością będzie wyjątkowym okresem świątecznym. Pobierz nasz przewodnik tutaj.
module.additional_description: Criteo pomaga w rozwiązywaniu codziennych problemów:   Docieraj do nowych odbiorców: Zainteresuj i przyciągnij nowych odwiedzających do Twojej strony dzięki spersonalizowanym  rekomendacjom produktowym. Criteo znajduje odbiorców, którzy są najbardziej zainteresowani Twoimi produktami.  Ponownie zaangażuj swoich obecnych klientów: Sprowadź dawnych klientów z powrotem na swoją stronę. Przypomnij im produkty, które przeglądali i pokaż im więcej artykułów, które pokochają.  Budowanie świadomości marki i ruchu w sieci to niezbędne kroki w prowadzeniu sprzedaży, szczególnie w przypadku nowszych stron internetowych lub stron o niskim natężeniu ruchu. Criteo może pomóc Ci w zwiększeniu oglądalności i sprawi, że Twoja marka będzie bardziej widoczna.

module.name: glotio
module.displayName: Glotio-Przetłumacz swój PrestaShop na ponad 50 języków
module.description: Glotio pozwala zautomatyzować tłumaczenie całej platformy PrestaShop. Oznacza to oszczędność czasu i możliwość prowadzenia sprzedaży w innych językach już od pierwszego dnia
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Glotio pozwala zautomatyzować tłumaczenie całej platformy PrestaShop. Oznacza to oszczędność czasu i możliwość prowadzenia sprzedaży w innych językach już od pierwszego dnia.
module.additional_description: Możliwość sprzedaży na skalę międzynarodową Automatyczne tłumaczenie treści Twojego sklepu Glotio to zdecydowanie więcej niż zwykłe narzędzie do automatycznego tłumaczenia. To system opracowany specjalnie dla platformy PrestaShop — pozwala automatycznie tłumaczyć wiele elementów Twojego sklepu internetowego bez konieczności importowania i eksportowania treści.Zwielokrotnij swoją sprzedaż, tłumacząc swój e-sklep na ponad 50 języków i sprzedając w wielu krajach! Jak to działa:Pobierz i zainstaluj nasz bezpłatny moduł. W sklepie z dodatkami PrestaShop znajdziesz nasz certyfikowany moduł. Pobierz go ZA DARMO i utwórz konto w ciągu zaledwie dwóch minut.Analizujemy Twój sklep pod kątem treści do przetłumaczenia. Dzięki naszemu kreatorowi w kilku krokach przejdziesz proces umożliwiający Glotio analizowanie Twojej platformy PrestaShop pod kątem treści do przetłumaczenia.Wybierz języki, na które chcesz tłumaczyć swoją platformę PrestaShop. Kiedy już ustalimy, jakie treści są dostępne do tłumaczenia, możesz wybrać języki docelowe. Pierwszy język jest BEZPŁATNY!Każdej nocy Glotio ciężko dla Ciebie pracuje. Języki, które aktywujesz w naszym panelu, będą automatycznie aktualizowane każdej nocy — dzięki temu treści w Twoim sklepie internetowym zawsze są aktualne. KLUCZOWE NARZĘDZIAZnajdź i zamień: zawsze możesz wyszukać dane słowo lub frazę i zastąpić je czymś innym. Dzięki temu narzędziu to bułka z masłem. Lista wykluczeń: pewnie znajdzie się kilka słów, których nie chcesz tłumaczyć, na przykład nazwy marek lub dostawców. Możesz automatycznie dodać je do listy wykluczeń. Inteligentny słownik: nikt nie zna sprzedawanych produktów tak dobrze, jak Ty i Twój zespół, dlatego możesz nauczyć Glotio jak tłumaczyć niektóre słowa. Co oferuje ten produkt?• Poprawia statystyki SEO: Glotio przestrzega zasad SEO obowiązujących w języku domyślnym, co pozwoli rozpocząć pozycjonowanie organiczne w każdym kraju, w którym prowadzisz sprzedaż z wykorzystaniem ojczystego języka jego mieszkańców.• Marketing międzynarodowy: przekaz danych w czasie rzeczywistym z możliwością eksportowania we wszystkich językach pozwala rozpocząć kampanię reklamową w nowych krajach i zwielokrotnić liczbę wizyt w sklepie. Twoja platforma PrestaShop zapisuje tłumaczenia, dzięki czemu możesz rozpocząć przekaz danych w czasie rzeczywistym w różnych językach.• Zwiększa wskaźnik konwersji, ponieważ prowadzisz sprzedaż w języku swoich klientów.• Tłumaczy cały Twój sklep internetowy (produkty, kategorie, atrybuty, cechy charakterystyczne, producenci, dostawcy, załączniki itp.) na ponad 50 języków w rekordowym czasie.• W sam raz dla każdego. Nie musisz umieć programować ani dysponować specjalistyczną wiedzą na temat PrestaShop czy też HTML/CSS.• Oszczędzasz czas. Przetłumacz swój sklep internetowy w krótkim czasie.• Płacisz tylko za przetłumaczoną treść, nie obowiązują comiesięczne opłaty.

module.name: izettleconnector
module.description: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the iZettle product library in 3 easy steps
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: This module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the iZettle product library in 3 easy steps.
module.additional_description: Create an iZettle product library in secondsThis module enables you to export your PrestaShop products to the iZettle product library in 3 easy steps. It synchronizes your product stock quantity and product prices continuously. So your product stock is kept up to date no matter if you are selling a product via iZettle on the point of sale or in your online shop. Easy product exportYou can either export your complete PrestaShop product library to iZettle or choose a specific category. Also, you can export single products to iZettle. During the export configuration you can choose if price and stock quantity are part of the export or if you just want to export the products to create the iZettle product library. Automatic synchronizationEverytime an item is sold in your store or online, the product data gets synchronized between PrestaShop and iZettle. The module is providing full control how the synchronization is performed. Automatically, manually or by setting up a cronjob.If you are using the manual sync, you will get a full overview of the product data changes before you perform the update. If an error occurs during synchronization, you will receive a push email notification. Synchronization historyYou can review all completed product export and product synchronization events. SecurityThe communication between iZettle and PrestaShop is based on the iZettle API. Any critical credentials are encrypted using the latest industry standard.  The services include: iZettle, a member of the PayPal family, is on a mission to help small businesses succeed in a world of giants – enabling people like you to accept in-person cash, cards, contactless and mobile payments. It also helps you to easily organise your products, track stock levels and monitor sales. The iZettle Reader:The iZettle reader 2 is super-fast and processes in-person contactless payments from credit cards, debit cards and American Express, as well as payments via Apple, Samsung and Google Pay. The iZettle Go app:The point-of-sale for any business. Seamlessly integrated with the iZettle Reader, it let’s you run your business – on the go or over the counter. Your shopfront and back office – all in one easy-to-use system.

module.name: revolutpayment
module.description: With this plugin you will be able to accept card payments on an eCommerce website easily and securely
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With this plugin you will be able to accept card payments on an eCommerce website easily and securely. Charge your customers in up to 14 currencies without worrying about pricy exchanges and get access to your funds quickly with next day settlement.
module.additional_description: We know that time and money matter to our merchants. That’s why we’re committed to costing them less and freeing up more of their time to grow their business.   Great pricingImprove your margins with our low rates: 1.3% (for all consumer cards from UK and EEA) & 2.8% (for all corporate cards and for consumer cards outside of the EEA)No additional fixed fees per transactionProcess up to £/€ 100,000 per month for free (depending on the plan you select and the cards your customers pay with)  FXCharge and settle in up to 14 currenciesExchange money at the Interbank Rate and avoid unnecessary costs SettlementAccess your funds 24h after your customer pays One place to manage all your business needsBest in class UX with a single interface for both your merchant and business accountsStart for free or get more from your money with our paid plans Take a look at our website to see why accepting payments through Revolut is the right decision for your business.
